name: Tropicali
description: Tropicali is a newer hybrid on the market. Known to provide an uplifting and cerebral high this strain can also be used for the relief of mild aches and pains. The flowers of the Tc have an alluring frosty mint green color with minimal twists of orange and sticky dewy looking trichomes.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Energetic, Euphoric, Hungry, Stress, Depression, Headaches, Lack of Appetite, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Headache
